page.title: 04LAND USE - AGRICULTURE
page.content:
Delamere/Eddisbury {LAND USE-AGRICULTURE} Pig Breeding Unit This unit has 180 sows & a few sheep.The pigs are hybrids & are either Camboroughs or Cotswolds, & are kept here until they are between 12 & 13 weeks old,around 70lbs in weight.Then they are sent to nearby Frodsham for fattening.
Fruit farm. This fruit farm is a Pick-your-own soft friut concern during the months of May to August.In June there are gooseberries,& strawberries,& July & August sees raspberries,redcurrants,& blackcurrants too. In September you can pick apples & pears from October to Christmas & a shop sells ready picked fruit as well.
